fields.text: Welcome to Chewse in San Francisco, where teams that eat together thrive together.
To place a new order for our family-style meals, press '[INDEX]'.
To order our breakfast platters, press '[INDEX]'.
One moment please while we connect you to our breakfast catering specialists.
To order our lunch family-style meals, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we transfer you to our lunch ordering team.
For order status and account inquiries, press '[INDEX]'.
To check the status of an existing order, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we retrieve your order details.
For billing and invoice questions, press '[INDEX]'.
One moment please while we connect you to our billing department.
